subject: Problem with Brake pedal
description_text:
Hello, I just set up my new Pro X Ultra pedals (Newest) and the brake pedal
is not working. When I connect and disconnect it from the control box, it
registers in the simsonn software for a moment, but when I press it in
nothing happens. The gas and clutch pedals work fine. I ran the firmware
update as soon as I plugged them in as well.

conversations.body_text: Hi Steven Holmes,  Please provide your order number so we can check the details. Also, after any mechanical or damper adjustments, please confirm whether you have used the Offset function to re-zero the initial signal. Additionally, please check whether the RJ11 4P4C connector on the brake pedal is loose. Have you secured the power cable with cable ties to prevent movement or poor contact?Â
